name: cwmsjs-generator
description: OpenAPI generator for building the cwmsjs JavaScript/TypeScript library for CWMS Data API
author: USACE,HEC,CWMS,OpenApi Contributors

scripts.build: npm run buildApi && npm run buildDocs
scripts.buildApi: npm run buildSpec && npm run openapi && cd cwmsjs && npm run build
scripts.buildDocs: npm run docs && npm run examples
scripts.buildSpec: npm run getSpec && npm run modSpec
scripts.clean: shx mkdir -p ./cwmsjs && shx rm -r ./cwmsjs && shx mkdir -p ./cwmsjs/docs && shx rm -r ./cwmsjs/docs
scripts.link: cd ./cwmsjs/dist && npm link && cd ../../tests && npm link cwmsjs
